name: HellQuest
description:
So you’re stuck in Hell obviously, but you want your freedom, so overlord, the ruler of Hell, gives you a chance to redeem yourself by collecting all of his playing cards. All the while our protagonist Soul, has to take on trapped demons, hell cannons, big bad bosses with only his trusty laser gun at his side. The challenges are quite treacherous, but our only hope is him.

Created for Mini Jam 69: Hell
